author: andschwa
body: This is so that the PSRP host and the command line host can share  a lot of  common code.  Next steps    Require less input to pshost  i.e. find things automatically    Refactor the AssemblyLoadContext part   Refactor the TPA list part   Use coreruncommon as subtree https   github.com dotnet coreclr blob master src coreclr hosts unixcoreruncommon coreruncommon.cpp  VSO create date - 10/21/2015 19:17:00     VSO closed date - 10/23/2015 12:41:00
title: [monad-native]: Refactor libpshost for shared CLR code
